Welcome to Claude Code!

This is a pre-release version of Claude in the terminal. As a pre-release, it:
• Is unsupported and not recommended for serious use
• May be buggy or lack polish
• May change in the future without notice (including its name and command)

Documentation: https://github.com/anthropics/claude-code
Bypassing Permissions: You are running with --dangerously-skip-permissions. Claude Code will write, execute, and perform other actions without confirming.

Claude: I'm Claude, an AI assistant. I'm ready to help you with coding, analysis, writing, math, research, and many other tasks. How can I assist you today?
